trans-unit.target: Lors de l'envoi de messages, il est possible que des fichiers perdus soient sauvegardés sur le serveur, merci de cliquer ici pour nettoyer le système :

trans-unit.source: There was an error on changing config
trans-unit.target: Une erreur s'est produite lors de la modification de la configuration

trans-unit.source: Need to be an admin to access this

trans-unit.target: Alerte : impossible d'accéder à la radio

trans-unit.source: DO NOT use this button UNLESS you have been asked by the manager to change the data transmission frequency of the radio.
trans-unit.target: DO NOT utilisez PAS ce bouton SAUF si le responsable vous a demandé de modifier la fréquence de transmission des données de la radio.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to change radio settings? this may cause the system to stop
trans-unit.target: Etes vous sûr de vouloir changer les paramètres de la radio ? Cela est susceptible de faire que la radio s'arrête de fonctionner

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to send PTT? This can cause irreparable problems
trans-unit.target: Etes vous sûr de vouloir envoyer un test sonore vers le PTT? Cela peut entraîner des problèmes irréparables
Envoyer un test sonore vers le PTT

trans-unit.source: Use this button only in dangerous or emergency situations. It is going to erase all data from HERMES system.
trans-unit.target: Use this button only in dangerous or emergency situations. It is going to erase all data from HERMES system.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to reset the radio to the default configuration?
trans-unit.target: Etes vous sûr de vouloir réinitialiser la radio à la configuration par défaut?

trans-unit.source: There was an error on changing configuration
trans-unit.target: Une erreur s'est produite lors du changement de configuration

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to reboot the Hermes system? This will stop messages transmission and reception.
trans-unit.target: Etes vous sûr de vouloir relancer le système Hermes? Cela va stopper la transmission et la réception des messages.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure do you want to start a SOS EMERGENCY operation? It is going to erase all data from HERMES system.
trans-unit.target: Are you sure do you want to start a SOS EMERGENCY operation? It is goingo to erase all data from HERMES sysyem.

trans-unit.source: There are no schedules for radio transmission
trans-unit.target: Il n'y a pas de calendriers de transmission radio

trans-unit.source: There was an error on your request
trans-unit.target: Une erreur s'est produite au sujet de votre demande

trans-unit.source: Stop transmission hour must be bigger than start time
trans-unit.target: L'heure de fin de transmission doit être ultérieure à l'heure de début

trans-unit.source: You need admin privileges to access this page
trans-unit.target: Vous devez disposer des privilèges d'administrateur pour accéder à cette page

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to synchronize now? This should be used only in case of emergency
trans-unit.target: Etes vous sûr de vouloir synchroniser maintenant? Cela ne doit être fait qu'en cas d'urgence

trans-unit.source: Total size of files to transmit: B
trans-unit.target: Taille totale des fichiers à transmettre : B

trans-unit.target: Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir annuler cette transmission?

trans-unit.source: There was an error on processing your request
trans-unit.target: Une erreur s'est produite lors votre demande

trans-unit.source: password must have at least 8 characters
trans-unit.target: le mot de passe doit contenir au moins 8 caractères

trans-unit.source: There was an error on processing your request
trans-unit.target: Une erreur s'est produite lors du traitement de votre demande

trans-unit.source: Verify the patterns to save the WiFi configurations.
trans-unit.target: Vérifier les règles relatives aux caractères non autorisés pour sauvegarder les configurations WIFI.

trans-unit.source: Hermes server is offline, please turn the station on.
trans-unit.target: Le serveur Hermes est déconnecté, merci d'allumer la station.

trans-unit.source: If your server is already on click here
trans-unit.target: Si votre serveur est déjà allumé, merci de cliquer ici

trans-unit.source: If you are seeing a "server offline" message, yet your server should, or seems to be on, it's possible that your system is corrupted. Please contact the support or the people you are usually in touch with. The support email is .
trans-unit.target: Si vous voyez un message “serveur déconnecté” alors que votre serveur devrait être allumé ou semble allumé, il est possible que votre système soit corrompu. Si vous avez déjà essayé d'accéder à HERMES depuis un autre appareil et le problème continue, il est possible que vous deviez amener votre station dans un endroit avec une connexion à internet et que vous contactiez les fournisseurs à pour planifier une session de maintenance en ligne.
Utilisateur inactif. Compte à rebours avant déconnexion

trans-unit.source: To download deltachat click on one of the links below:
trans-unit.target: Pour télécharger Deltachat cliquez sur un des liens ci-dessous :
Sélectionnez les utilisateurs à qui envoyer l'email :
envoyer un e-mail à la sélectionnée

trans-unit.source: If you have a problem and are not sure who to write to
trans-unit.target: Si vous avez un problème et n'êtes pas sûr à qui écrire

trans-unit.source: There was an error on processing your request
trans-unit.target: Une erreur s'est produite lors du traitement de votre demande

trans-unit.source: HERMES provides a telecommunication system through the use of shortwave / HF radio.
trans-unit.target: HERMES provides a telecommunication system through the use of shortwave / HF radio.

trans-unit.source: Hermes system allows transmission of text and files between connected stations, through public messages, sent through this interface or private messages, though Deltachat application or webmail interface.
trans-unit.target: Hermes system allows transmission of text and files between connected stations, through public messages, sent through this interface or private messages, though Deltachat application or webmail interface.

trans-unit.source: The system uses a digital radio that schedules transmissions between stations using the UUCP protocol. All communication between stations are encrypted and happen outside the internet.
trans-unit.target: The system uses a digital radio that schedules transmissions between stations using the UUCP protocol. All communication between stations are encrypted and happen outside the internet.

trans-unit.source: On the front of Hermes Box there are 4 different led lights:
trans-unit.target: On the front of Hermes Box there are 4 different led lights:

trans-unit.source: SYS: System LED, blinks when the system is not ready to be used. SYS LED typically blinks when the equipment is turning on or when it is turning off; when the system is on it will stay solid green.
trans-unit.target: SYS: System LED, blinks when the system is not ready to be used. SYS LED typically blinks when the equipment is turning on or when it is turning off; when the system is on it will stay solid green.

trans-unit.source: ANT: Green when the antenna is functioning properly. ANT LED turns Red when a high SWR value is detected, meaning the high SWR protection is enabled and the radio will not transmit. SWR protection needs to be reset if active (Red), for the radio to became operational again, which can be done in the radio administrative interface. Check the RF cable and Antenna before resetting in the interface;
trans-unit.target: ANT: Green when the antenna is functioning properly. ANT LED turns Red when a high SWR value is detected, meaning the high SWR protection is enabled and the radio will not transmit. SWR protection needs to be reset if active (Red), for the radio to became operational again, which can be done in the radio administrative interface. Check the RF cable and Antenna before resetting in the interface;

trans-unit.source: CONECTADO: LED on (solid Green) means that the station is connected to another station;
trans-unit.target: CONECTADO: LED on (solid Green) means that the station is connected to another station;

trans-unit.source: TX: LED on means the radio is transmitting. When this LED is off, it is in receive mode. If the CONECTADO LED is on and the TX LED is off, the station is actively receiving. During active communication with another station the CONECTADO LED will be solid Green and the TX LED will turn on and off;
trans-unit.target: TX: LED on means the radio is transmitting. When this LED is off, it is in receive mode. If the CONECTADO LED is on and the TX LED is off, the station is actively receiving. During active communication with another station the CONECTADO LED will be solid Green and the TX LED will turn on and off;

trans-unit.source: When accessing the local Hermes WiFi network through a cellphone or computer, you will be directed to the HERMES web interface. From there you can read public messages sent to your station, create users for e-mail, find the download links for deltachat app and send public messages between stations if you are allowed to. It's also possible manage and administer the system from the web interface.
trans-unit.target: When accessing the local Hermes WiFi network through a cellphone or computer, you will be directed to the HERMES web interface. From there you can read public messages sent to your station, create users for e-mail, find the download links for deltachat app and send public messages between stations if you are allowed to. It's also possible manage and administer the system from the web interface.

trans-unit.source: Public messages can be sent between stations, and are listed on the main page of the web interface. Each stations can be configured to determine who can send public messages, if everyone, if only registered users or only admin users.
trans-unit.target: Public messages can be sent between stations, and are listed on the main page of the web interface. Each stations can be configured to determine who can send public messages, if everyone, if only registered users or only admin users.

trans-unit.source: If sending messages is allowed for you, you can compose them by clicking on the icon. On the message is possible to attach files such as images or sound files.
trans-unit.target: If sending messages is allowed for you, you can compose them by clicking on the icon. On the message is possible to attach files such as images or sound files.

trans-unit.source: Public messages can be sent to your own station, which is a easy way to publicize news inside your own community.
trans-unit.target: Public messages can be sent to your own station, which is a easy way to publicize news inside your own community.

trans-unit.source: Public messages can also be password protected, which means that only the ones that know the password will be able to read their content, but their description still will be readable by everyone.
trans-unit.target: Public messages can also be password protected, which means that only the ones that know the password will be able to read their content, but their description still will be readable by everyone.

trans-unit.source: Have in mind that once a password for the message (has to be at least 4 characters) is defined, there is no way to recover it, nor to change it.
trans-unit.target: Have in mind that once a password for the message (has to be at least 4 characters) is defined, there is no way to recover it, nor to change it.

trans-unit.source: A system administrator can change who can send public messages and who can attach files on messages between stations: everyone withe access to the network, only registered users, or only administrators.
trans-unit.target: A system administrator can change who can send public messages and who can attach files on messages between stations: everyone withe access to the network, only registered users, or only administrators.

trans-unit.source: Because the radio propagation of data is very low, file attachments are constrained to 20kb sizes. The system will accept inputs for image and sound up to 30mB and for other files util 2mb, and will try to compress them to fit the maximum size for packages. For image and sound, the resolution can be changed, and the quality may be affected. For other formats, a simple compressor will be applied and message packages with size greater than 20kb may not be transmitted.
trans-unit.target: Because the radio propagation of data is very low, file attachments are constrained to 20kb sizes. The system will accept inputs for image and sound up to 30mB and for other files util 2mb, and will try to compress them to fit the maximum size for packages. For image and sound, the resolution can be changed, and the quality may be affected. For other formats, a simple compressor will be applied and message packages with size greater than 20kb may not be transmitted.

trans-unit.source: Private messages in the HERMES system work through personal e-mails. Any user can create an Hermes email account by clicking on the "create user" option on the login screen.
trans-unit.target: Private messages in the HERMES system work through personal e-mails. Any user can create an Hermes email account by clicking on the "create user" option on the login screen.

trans-unit.source: Each workstation has a different domain, which can be seen at the top of the interface. On this station, all emails will be created within the domain and will look like this: user_name@ . Where username is the username used when creating the user.
trans-unit.target: Each workstation has a different domain, which can be seen at the top of the interface. On this station, all emails will be created within the domain and will look like this: user_name@ . Where username is the username used when creating the user.

trans-unit.source: Through a redirect, HERMES emails can be sent to and received from external servers, but be aware that there is a limitation when attaching data due to the limitations of data transmission capacity over radio.
trans-unit.target: Through a redirect, HERMES emails can be sent to and received from external servers, but be aware that there is a limitation when attaching data due to the limitations of data transmission capacity over radio.

trans-unit.source: On the email link on the web interface you will find links for webmail (roundcube), for Deltachat download, and also it's possible to select users to send messages with your configured email client.
trans-unit.target: On the email link on the web interface you will find links for webmail (roundcube), for Deltachat download, and also it's possible to select users to send messages with your configured email client.

trans-unit.source: Through the Deltachat app, one can use HERMES emails to conduct personal message exchange communications (similar to chat); this app works on most smartphones and has a similar appearance to Whatsapp or Telegram. Keep in mind that due to the scheduling of transmission of the messages, they may take a while to arrive, depending on the amount of messages in the queue and the gateway station's schedule of operation.
trans-unit.target: Through the Deltachat app, one can use HERMES emails to conduct personal message exchange communications (similar to chat); this app works on most smartphones and has a similar appearance to Whatsapp or Telegram. Keep in mind that due to the scheduling of transmission of the messages, they may take a while to arrive, depending on the amount of messages in the queue and the gateway station's schedule of operation.

trans-unit.source: To download Deltachat, select one of the packages below, according to your phone's operating system:
trans-unit.target: To download Deltachat, select one of the packages below, according to your phone's operating system:

trans-unit.source: On Iphone and ipad you will need to download the app from the App Store in a place with internet.
trans-unit.target: On Iphone and ipad you will need to download the app from the App Store in a place with internet.

trans-unit.source: The HERMES system includes a compression system suitable for multimedia messages like images or audio being sent over HF. End-to-end encryption should be disabled in order to allow the server-based image and audio compression to work properly, otherwise image and audio exchange will not be possible.
trans-unit.target: The HERMES system includes a compression system suitable for multimedia messages like images or audio being sent over HF. End-to-end encryption should be disabled in order to allow the server-based image and audio compression to work properly, otherwise image and audio exchange will not be possible.

trans-unit.source: The steps to find this feature in Deltachat are: -> Advanced -> Autocrypt, Prefer End-To-End Encryption: turn off: If you wish, you can also turn on email delivery monitoring to check if your emails were correctly delivered.
trans-unit.target: The steps to find this feature in Deltachat are: -> Advanced -> Autocrypt, Prefer End-To-End Encryption: turn off: If you wish, you can also turn on email delivery monitoring to check if your emails were correctly delivered.

trans-unit.source: Deltachat, by default, tags its emails and show only the "known" messages (emails) that was sent by another Deltachat application. In order to be able to interact with e-mails from any e-mail client software, enable the option "show all emails". The steps to find this feature in Deltachat are: Burger Menu ( ) -> Settings -> Chats and Media -> Show Classic E-Mails -> All.
trans-unit.target: Deltachat, by default, tags its emails and show only the "known" messages (emails) that was sent by another Deltachat application. In order to be able to interact with e-mails from any e-mail client software, enable the option "show all emails". The steps to find this feature in Deltachat are: Burger Menu ( ) -> Settings -> Chats and Media -> Show Classic E-Mails -> All.

trans-unit.source: In order to configure DeltaChat, first an e-mail account should be created, on the creat user session, acessed trhough admin or email link on the main menu. In order to login to an e-mail account, only the e-mail address and password fields should be filled, as shown below. The user and password will be the same as those created when first creating a login on HERMES and for use with the RoundCube webmail, such as: username@ .
trans-unit.target: In order to configure DeltaChat, first an e-mail account should be created, on the creat user session, acessed trhough admin or email link on the main menu. In order to login to an e-mail account, only the e-mail address and password fields should be filled, as shown below. The user and password will be the same as those created when first creating a login on HERMES and for use with the RoundCube webmail, such as: username@ .

trans-unit.source: Once the messages are sent, they will go to a transmission queue before arriving at their final destination. A system administrator can cancel the packages before they are sent, and also delete the sent and received messages. This is a task that need to be done often to avoid that the space in the server ends.
trans-unit.target: Once the messages are sent, they will go to a transmission queue before arriving at their final destination. A system administrator can cancel the packages before they are sent, and also delete the sent and received messages. This is a task that need to be done often to avoid that the space in the server ends.

trans-unit.source: As the communication between the stations are unidirectional, the transmissions are schedules to happen acconding to the central staion, alternating between reception and transmission events. In an emergency case, the system administrator can force message transmission queue by clicking on the "transmit now" link. This can interrupt receiving messages from other stations for a while.
trans-unit.target: As the communication between the stations are unidirectional, the transmissions are schedules to happen acconding to the central staion, alternating between reception and transmission events. In an emergency case, the system administrator can force message transmission queue by clicking on the "transmit now" link. This can interrupt receiving messages from other stations for a while.

trans-unit.source: To access admin features, you need an admin password, while anyone can create an user account, and only the system's admins can create new administrator users.
trans-unit.target: To access admin features, you need an admin password, while anyone can create an user account, and only the system's admins can create new administrator users.

trans-unit.source: Inside the admin section, an admin user will find the following options:
trans-unit.target: Inside the admin section, an admin user will find the following options:

trans-unit.source: Users management: allows creation of new users, updating data of registered users and to delete users of the system. Every username correspond to a email account with the same name of the kind username@servername
trans-unit.target: Users management: allows creation of new users, updating data of registered users and to delete users of the system. Every username correspond to a email account with the same name of the kind username@servername

trans-unit.source: On this station the server name will be:
trans-unit.target: On this station the server name will be:

trans-unit.source: Administrators can also give admin powers to regular users, by clicking on the "is admin" checkbox on the update user interface
trans-unit.target: Administrators can also give admin powers to regular users, by clicking on the "is admin" checkbox on the update user interface

trans-unit.source: Message administration: In this section an administrator can determine who can send public messages, and who can attach files in public messages between stations: anyone, only registered users, or only administrators.
trans-unit.target: Message administration: In this section an administrator can determine who can send public messages, and who can attach files in public messages between stations: anyone, only registered users, or only administrators.

trans-unit.source: Transmission List: Shows the jobs on the queue for transmission, with their sizes and destination, where an admin can delete messages on the queue. It also has the option to transmit now, that should be used only in exeptional emergency cases.
trans-unit.target: Transmission List: Shows the jobs on the queue for transmission, with their sizes and destination, where an admin can delete messages on the queue. It also has the option to transmit now, that should be used only in exeptional emergency cases.

trans-unit.source: Network info: displays information about the system, such as network addresses, call sign, server name, etc.
trans-unit.target: Network info: displays information about the system, such as network addresses, call sign, server name, etc.

trans-unit.source: Stations: provides a list of the connected stations on the system. If the station is a central station, it also allows to select which stations will be enabled to message transmission.
trans-unit.target: Stations: provides a list of the connected stations on the system. If the station is a central station, it also allows to select which stations will be enabled to message transmission.

trans-unit.source: Central Station: This menu will be shown only on the central station, and is where the admins will set the schedules for transmission to the other stations.
trans-unit.target: Central Station: This menu will be shown only on the central station, and is where the admins will set the schedules for transmission to the other stations.

trans-unit.source: Detailed Log: provides access to system logs, such as email logs and uucp logs, that register every activity on the system.
trans-unit.target: Detailed Log: provides access to system logs, such as email logs and uucp logs, that register every activity on the system.

trans-unit.source: Radio configuration: provides an interface to access and change frequency and radio transmission mode. It also allows to restore default radio configuration.
trans-unit.target: Radio configuration: provides an interface to access and change frequency and radio transmission mode. It also allows to restore default radio configuration.

trans-unit.source: To access the system, three main components are needed: a smartphone or a computer, a HERMES server and an antenna with a transmitter.
trans-unit.target: To access the system, three main components are needed: a smartphone or a computer, a HERMES server and an antenna with a transmitter.

trans-unit.source: To know what to do in case of an error, you first need to know which component is causing the problem.
trans-unit.target: To know what to do in case of an error, you first need to know which component is causing the problem.

trans-unit.source: To find out if the problem is with the device connecting to the network (cell phone, tablet, computer), the easiest way is to test access from another device, or from another browser on the same device. If the problem is only with you, it is possible that the problem is in the network settings. Check below the necessary settings to access the Hermes network:
trans-unit.target: To find out if the problem is with the device connecting to the network (cell phone, tablet, computer), the easiest way is to test access from another device, or from another browser on the same device. If the problem is only with you, it is possible that the problem is in the network settings. Check below the necessary settings to access the Hermes network:

trans-unit.source: If this does not solve your problem, try cleaning your browser's history and logging in again, or change browsers. If none of this resolves the problem, it is possible that your device is incompatible with the network.
trans-unit.target: If this does not solve your problem, try cleaning your browser's history and logging in again, or change browsers. If none of this resolves the problem, it is possible that your device is incompatible with the network.

trans-unit.source: In case of problem in the Antenna, a LED will light up on the server box, in this case, check the correct position of the power supply wires and check the position and integrity of the Antenna, coaxial cable, and the transmitter.
trans-unit.target: In case of problem in the Antenna, a LED will light up on the server box, in this case, check the correct position of the power supply wires and check the position and integrity of the Antenna, coaxial cable, and the transmitter.

trans-unit.source: If the messages in the transmission list are not being transmitted over time, check if the radio settings have been changed, in which case it could be that the other stations are offline. To remedy you could restore the factory default settings.
trans-unit.target: If the messages in the transmission list are not being transmitted over time, check if the radio settings have been changed, in which case it could be that the other stations are offline. To remedy you could restore the factory default settings.

trans-unit.source: If the problem is with the digital radio, there will be an error message when the administrator goes into Administration -> radio configuration.
trans-unit.target: If the problem is with the digital radio, there will be an error message when the administrator goes into Administration -> radio configuration.

trans-unit.source: If you receive a message saying server offline, your equipment is likely turned off. If the message persists, it could be that some part of the system is corrupted. In this case, you may need to take your equipment to a place with internet for online maintenance.
trans-unit.target: If you receive a message saying server offline, your equipment is likely turned off. If the message persists, it could be that some part of the system is corrupted. In this case, you may need to take your equipment to a place with internet for online maintenance.

trans-unit.source: To a better HERMES experience use the chromium/chrome browser
trans-unit.target: Pour une expérience d'utilisation d'HERMES optimale, merci d'utiliser le navigateur chromium/chrome

trans-unit.source: To login to the system, put your username and password
trans-unit.target: Pour vous connecter au système, entrez votre nom d'utilisateur et votre mot de passe

trans-unit.source: There was an error on precessing your request
trans-unit.target: There was an error on precessing your request
Message protégé, entrer le mot de passe :

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this message?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this message?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure yo want to delete this message?
trans-unit.target: Etes vous certain de vouloir mettre à la corbeille ce message ?

trans-unit.source: Only registered users can send messages to other stations, if you are a registered user, please log in.
trans-unit.target: Seuls les utilisateurs enregistrés peuvent envoyer des messages à d'autres stations ; si vous êtes un utilisateur enregistré, merci de vous connecter.

trans-unit.source: Only admin users can send messages to other stations, if you are an admin, please log in.
trans-unit.target: Seuls les administrateurs peuvent envoyer des messages à d'autres stations ; si vous êtes un administrateur, merci de vous connecter.

trans-unit.source: File's too big, max size is
trans-unit.target: Le fichier est trop volumineux, la taille maximum est
le champ "mot de passe" doit être rempli

trans-unit.source: There was an error on sending your message
trans-unit.target: Une erreur s'est produite lors de l'envoi de votre message

trans-unit.source: Your message was sent to the transmission list
trans-unit.target: Votre message a été envoyé à la liste de transmission
Alerte : impossible d'accéder aux messages envoyés

trans-unit.source: Are you sure yo want to delete this message?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure yo want to delete this message?
chargement de l'état de la radio...

trans-unit.source: There was an error on processing your request
trans-unit.target: Une erreur sest produite lors du traitement de votre demande

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to restore the factory system? this will delete all users, emails and messages !!!
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to restore the factory system? this will delete all users, emails and messages !!!

trans-unit.source: Please type your password again to confirm factory restore:
trans-unit.target: Please type your password again to confirm factory restore :

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to upgrade the system? this may cause the sytem to break !!!
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to upgrade the system? this may cause the sytem to break !!!

trans-unit.source: Please type your password again to confirm upgrade:
trans-unit.target: Please type your password again to confirm upgrade:

trans-unit.source: There was an error on processing your request
trans-unit.target: There was an error on processing your request

trans-unit.source: Need to be an admin to access this

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to shut down Hermes system? This will stop messages transmision and reception.
